xml: <Field Type="DateTime" DisplayName="Geburtsdatum" Required="TRUE" EnforceUniqueValues="FALSE" Indexed="FALSE" Format="DateOnly" Group="Kids Diary - Fields" FriendlyDisplayFormat="Disabled" ID="{2027f892-e6df-4ce7-b41d-767d5302130a}" StaticName="kddyDtiBirthday" Name="kddyDtiBirthday"></Field>

<Field Type="Calculated" DisplayName="Age" EnforceUniqueValues="FALSE" Indexed="FALSE" Format="DateOnly" Decimals="0" LCID="1033" ResultType="Text" ReadOnly="TRUE" Group="Kids Diary - Fields" ID="{24675d6a-043a-42e5-b522-5601b6ed1f5c}" StaticName="kddycalcAge" Name="kddycalcAge" Required="FALSE" Percentage="FALSE"><Formula>=IF(LEN(kddyDtiBirthday)>0,DATEDIF(kddyDtiBirthday,TODAY(),"Y"),"0")</Formula><FieldRefs><FieldRef Name="kddyDtiBirthday" ID="{2027f892-e6df-4ce7-b41d-767d5302130a}" /><FieldRef Name="kddyDtiBirthday" ID="{2027f892-e6df-4ce7-b41d-767d5302130a}" /></FieldRefs></Field>
